definitions: the quality of being experienced and sophisticated

examples.text: both display wisdom and worldliness of much older men
my transition from childish cluelessness to teenage worldliness

shortDefinitions: quality of being experienced and sophisticated

definitions: concern with material values or ordinary life rather than a spiritual existence

examples.text: Chaucer drew attention to clerical avarice and worldliness

shortDefinitions: concern with material values or ordinary life rather than spiritual existence
